pr_title: [GEOT-6616]: mapGet FilterFunction to get a value from a map given th…

timeline.message: [GEOT-6616]: mapGet FilterFunction to get a value from a map given the mapName.key identifier

timeline.bodyHTML:
NPE prone, check if map is not null. Also, no need to check if the map contains, one can simply call get:

Suggested change
if (map.containsKey(key)) {
if (map != null) {
return map.get(key);
}
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.message: [GEOT-6616]: mapGet FilterFunction to get a value from a map given the mapName.key identifier
